name: Pembina Pipeline Corporation
description: Pembina Pipeline Corporation is a leading North American provider of transportation and midstream services for the energy sector. Established in 1954 and headquartered in Calgary, Alberta, Pembina operates an extensive network of pipelines and facilities that transport crude oil, natural gas liquids (NGL), and natural gas. The company's integrated services include the transportation, processing, and storage of energy products, catering to the needs of producers and consumers. Pembina is committed to safety and environmental stewardship, employing advanced technology and sustainable practices to minimize its ecological footprint. The company has grown significantly over the decades through strategic acquisitions and organic growth, positioning itself as a key player in the energy infrastructure landscape. Pembina’s diverse portfolio includes over 18,000 kilometers of pipelines and a variety of processing facilities, ensuring reliable delivery of energy products across North America. The company further enhances its capabilities through its logistics services, which optimize the supply chain for its customers. With a strong focus on responsible development, Pembina is actively involved in community engagement and social responsibility initiatives. As the energy landscape evolves, Pembina is dedicated to adapting and innovating to meet the changing demands of the market while ensuring the well-being of its stakeholders.
